text: Yahweh Challenges Job
Then\f + \fr 38:1 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* Yahweh answered Job from the storm, and he said,
“Who \add is\add* this darkening counsel
by words without knowledge?
⸤Prepare yourself for a difficult task like a man⸥,\f + \fr 38:3 \ft Literally “Gird up like a man your loins” \f*
and I will question you, and you shall declare to me.
Yahweh Interrogates Job
“Where were you at my laying the foundation of \add the\add* earth?
Tell \add me\add*, if you possess understanding.
Who determined its measurement? Yes, you do know.
Or who stretched \add the\add* measuring line upon it?
On what were its bases sunk?
Or who laid its cornerstone,
when \add the\add* morning stars were singing together
and all the sons of God\f + \fr 38:7 \ft Or “heavenly beings” \f* shouted for joy?
“Or \add who\add* shut \add the\add* sea in with doors
at its bursting, \add when\add* it went out of \add the\add* womb,
at my making \add the\add* clouds its garment
and thick darkness its swaddling band,
and I prescribed my rule for it,
and I set bars and doors,
and I said, ‘You shall come up to here, but\f + \fr 38:11 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* you shall not go further,
and here it will set \add a boundary\add* ⸤for your proud surging waves⸥’?\f + \fr 38:11 \ft Literally “for \fq the \ft pride of your surging waves” \f*
“Have you ⸤ever in your life⸥\f + \fr 38:12 \ft Literally “from your days” \f* commanded \add the\add* morning?
Have you made the dawn know its place,
to take hold of the earth’s skirts
so that\f + \fr 38:13 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* the wicked might be shaken off from it?
It is changed like clay \add under\add* a seal,
and they appear like a garment.
And their light is withheld from \add the\add* wicked,
and \add their\add* uplifted arm is broken.
“Have you entered into \add the\add* sea’s sources?
Or have you walked around in \add the\add* recesses of the deep?
Have \add the\add* gates of death been revealed to you?
Or have you seen \add the\add* gates of deep shadow?
Have you considered closely \add the\add* earth’s vast expanse?
Declare \add it\add*, if you know all of it.
“Where then\f + \fr 38:19 \ft Or “Where exactly” \f* \add is\add* the way \add where\add* \add the\add* light dwells?
And where then\f + \fr 38:19 \ft Or “where exactly” \f* \add is\add* its place,
that you may take it to its territory,
and that you might discern the paths to its home?
You know, for you were born then,
and the number of your days \add is\add* great.
Have you entered into \add the\add* storehouses of \add the\add* snow,
or\f + \fr 38:22 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* have you seen \add the\add* storehouses of \add the\add* hail,
which I have reserved for \add the\add* time of trouble,
for \add the\add* day of battle and war?
Where then\f + \fr 38:24 \ft Or “Where exactly” \f* \add is\add* the way \add where\add* \add the\add* light is distributed,
\add where\add* he scatters \add the\add* east wind upon \add the\add* earth?
“Who has cut open a channel for the torrents
and a way for \add the\add* ⸤thunder bolts⸥,\f + \fr 38:25 \ft Literally “bolt of thunders” \f*
to bring rain on a land ⸤where no one lives⸥,\f + \fr 38:26 \ft Literally “not a man” \f*
a desert ⸤where no humans live⸥,\f + \fr 38:26 \ft Literally “not humans in it” \f*
to satisfy desert and wasteland,
and to cause \add the ground\add* to put forth \add the\add* rising of grass?
Is there a father for the rain,
or who fathered \add the\add* drops of dew?
From whose womb did the ice come forth,
and who fathered \add the\add* frost of heaven?
Like stone \add the\add* waters become hard,
and \add the\add* faces of the deep freeze.
“Can you bind \add the\add* chains of \add the\add* Pleiades,
or can you loosen \add the\add* cords of Orion?
Can you lead forth the southern constellations at their appointed time,
or\f + \fr 38:32 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* can you lead \add the\add* Bear with its children?
Do you know heaven’s statutes,
or can you establish their rule on the earth?
Can you lift up your voice to the clouds
so that\f + \fr 38:34 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* a flood of water may cover you?
Can you send forth lightnings, that they may go?
And will they say to you, ‘Here we are’?
Who has put wisdom in the ibis,\f + \fr 38:36 \ft Or “inner parts” \f*
or who has given understanding to the rooster?\f + \fr 38:36 \ft Or “mind” \f*
Who can number \add the\add* clouds with wisdom?
Or\f + \fr 38:37 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* who can tilt heaven’s jars,
at \add the\add* flowing of \add the\add* dust into a cast
and \add the\add* clods cling together?
“Can you hunt prey for \add the\add* lion?
And can you satisfy \add the\add* hunger of strong lions
when they are crouched in the dens,
\add when\add* they lie in the thicket in an ambush?
Who prepares for the crow its prey,
when its young ones cry to God for help,
\add and\add* they wander around ⸤for lack of food⸥?\f + \fr 38:41 \ft Literally “for no food” \f*
